snippet: Starting Saturday, North Dakota’s varsity athletics teams are operating without an official nickname or corresponding logo until at least Jan. 1, 2015, as mandated by the State Legislature
abstract: University of North Dakota is one step closer to phasing out the Fighting Sioux nickname, as mandated by State Legislature; its varsity athletics teams are operating without an official nickname or corresponding logo until at least Jan 1, 2015, as university works to retire nickname and logo deemed offensive by NCAA.
lead_paragraph: Starting Saturday, North Dakota’s varsity athletics teams are operating without an official nickname or corresponding logo until at least Jan. 1, 2015, as mandated by the State Legislature
